img.title: This year, our team took home the dark blue ribbon, better than the midnight blue we got last year but still short of the winning navy blue.

img.title: This was always going to be a controversial Wirecutter post, but what really got them in trouble were their 'budget' and 'upgrade' picks.

img.title: "It's not an influenza, but the onset has notes of the '09 H1N1 strain." "Ah yes, that was a good year for H1N1."

img.title: Hard to believe that for so many years once they were fully extended we just let them tip over.
